results.title: Love Never Fails Frame - Heart Frame - Valentine Frame - Love Frame - Sweetheart Frame - 5x5 Photo Frame - Black and Red Wood Frame
results.description:
This black wooden frame has a heart shaped opening for a 5x5 inch photo.  The words "Love Never Fails" and "1 Corinthians 13:8" are applied to the frame in red glitter, along with several red glitter hearts. The appliques are in red glitter vinyl. The words and hearts were cut from vinyl and then applied to the surface.  This frame does not include glass.

This would make a great Valentine's Day gift!

Items are handmade, and no two will be alike.

results.title: Wooden Name Sign - Wood Signs - Wood Word Sign - Wall Decor - Nursery Sign - Wall Hanging - Wooden Words
results.description:
Custom Name 7"- 8" Tall
.・。.・゜✭・.・✫・゜・。..・。.・゜✭・.・✫・゜・。.

Description
--------------------------------------------------
These wooden words can be used in many different ways. You can choose a name and use it in a nursery or in a bedroom as wall decor. You can choose a word and have it in your entryway or on your wall in the living room. 

♥ The name will be around 7" - 8" tall depending on how many letters in your name and which font you choose, the width depends on your name, and the font choice as well

Ordering
---------------------------------------------------
♥ Select how many letters from the drop down menu you shall need.
♥ Select the font style you want from the drop down menu
♥ Leave a note to seller with the color paint you would like, and the NAME! Our color chart is in the above photos. 

♥♥♥ If you have a name like Sarah Ann, you will want to select "5" Letters & another order for 3 letters, not one 8 letter name, or it will run together and not look right ♥♥♥

♥ All Wooden Name signs are custom made to order. You will not be able to return or exchange them. However if there is a problem with your order, please let us know.

results.title: Live Laugh Love Parody Cry Sad Onion Pink A4 Risograph Print Poster
results.description:
Some days, you just have to accept that you are a bit of a sad onion. This little guy in the print really understands what you’re going through! So if you’re sick of those cheesy Live Laugh Love signs, counter it with this weepy onion. 

FACTS:
A4 in size.
Printed on recyled paper using soya based inks.
Printed and designed in Manchester.
Two colour risograph print

NOTE: Due to the risograph print process and how it aligns, no two prints will be exactly the same! Also, shipping to the USA and Canada is sent at a standard international postage. If you want signed for/tracked send us a message :)

Illustrated by Elsa Hingley-Knight @elsaghk
Part of 2B Or Not 2B
@2bmcr

results.title: Live Laugh Love Bedroom Wall Decor, Master Bedroom Decal, Bedroom Wall Art, Inspirational decor, Wooden Connected Words, Gallery Wall Decor
results.description:
This wooden word comes unfinished and unpainted. Each is individually cut and is available in a variety of sizes ranging from 3 inches long to 42 inches long. You can hand paint, spray paint, decoupage, mod podge or apply any other type of surface treatment to the word!

SIZES/THICKNESS-
All items are laser cut (edges will be dark) from cabinet grade MDF. This method delivers the very best resolution and quality of cut.
1/8 inch Material Thickness Is Available for Sizes up to 16 inches Long
1/4 inch Material Thickness Is Available for Sizes up to 18 inches Long
3/8 inch Material Thickness Is Available for Sizes up to 42 inches Long
1/2 inch Material Thickness Is Available for Sizes up to 42 inches Long

WHY BUY FROM US?
- everything in our store ships FREE
- orders ship out the same business day or the next business day
- hassle free return policy
- we use strong and beautiful wood
- all products are laser cut - best possible quality with no sanding!
- everything made in the USA by a family

REVIEWS-
We know how important reviews are when purchasing online. Since we just opened this shop we don't have many reviews yet. We want you to be confident in your purchase. Please feel free to look at the reviews from our other etsy shop (Buildeez) until this shop (CrazyCutouts) gets more of its own: https://www.etsy.com/your/shops/Buildeez/reviews?ref=seller_platform_hdr 

HOW TO HANG THEM- 
For small to medium sized letters: double sided foam mounting tape works great. Hot gluing ribbon to the back and then hang it on a nail. You can use dots of hot glue on the back of the letter and adhere it directly to the surface you are hanging it on.
For the larger letters: it is good to use liquid nails if you want to permanently attach it to a surface. Or, you can also use sawtooth hanging hardware that can be found at any local hardware store. 

DON'T SEE WHAT YOU NEED?
Try our sister shop: https://www.etsy.com/shop/Buildeez?ref=hdr_shop_menu
Or convo us with any custom orders!

results.title: Live Laugh Love --- Wall Vinyl Decal Sticker Family Kids Room Mural Decor Motivation Love Home Family Fun Lettering Dance Entryway Kitchen
results.description:
Live Laugh Love Wall Decal


High quality, easy to apply, wall decal ready to be applied to any smooth, flat surface.

Multiple colors are available, please leave your selection in the notes to seller during checkout. The color options are shown in the color chart image. If a color is not chosen, the color shown will be sent.


We can do custom designs or custom sizes, just contact us, we are happy to work with you!

Great for home decoration. Easy to apply and remove. If you are planning on applying the decal to a vehicle or other outdoor surface, let us know because we have a different material that may better suit your needs.


We can make this decal larger or smaller to fit your project. Please contact me for a quote on larger sizes.

Satisfaction guaranteed.

Product Details:
• High quality matte vinyl for that painted-on look
• Easy to apply and removable (but not reusable)
• Premium commercial grade vinyl that is waterproof and UV protected
• Decal will last for years without peeling or fading
• Use indoors or outdoors
• Made in the USA
• The decals are cut out, so they have no background. The background is whatever you place the decal on.


Installation:
You will be provided with an instruction sheet with your order. Whether this is your very first time using a vinyl decal or you are a seasoned pro, please don't hesitate to contact me if you have any installation questions.

*** APPLICATION TOOL ***
If you would like a professional vinyl application tool, they are available here with no additional shipping cost:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/227960720/squeegee-vinyl-decal-application-tool


Made To Order:
Every decal is made to order once purchased. This means that we will cut your design in the color you have chosen only after your order has been placed.
It can take anywhere from 1 to 3 business days for your order to be cut and shipped out, but most orders are shipped the next day.

results.title: LIVE LOVE LAUGH Heart Mandala Painted Rock stone, Valentine's Day, gift, painted stone garden stone quotes flower floral ooak
results.description:
Hand picked rock from the emerald coast area of Florida.

1.The word Love with the O being a heart and mandala like pattern.
   Hearts in metallic colors. Painted on round, flat rock.
2. Live, Love, Laugh words with flowers. Flowers can be customized to different colors per your choosing.

I love how they turned out. 

I used acrylic paints and a sealer for long life. 

I can do custom work, pls send a request with details or graphics.

I love painting and hope this rock gives you as much joy as it did me in creating it. 

Makes a great gift or added addition to a rockbed, potted plant. 

~~All rocks are made to order! Some may already be available. Please message for current photo. Each item is unique and OOAK.

results.title: Mini Discs Triple Necklace Set w/Pearl. Hand Stamped Curved Names. Small charm, silver, copper, gold.Round metal tags.Customize trio Crystal
results.description:
Your necklace includes:

3 mini discs, 1/2" wide, 1 word on each
1 Swarovski crystal (or freshwater pearl)
1 silver dainty bead-ball chain, up to 24" (you tell me the length during checkout) (dainty 1.5mm ball chain has small tube closure)

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

♥ To order your set like the main photo, 3 names, curved along the edges, using 1/16th inch Gothic lowercase font, select the metal finishes you want (if mixed, detail it during your checkout notes). Then select the Gothic font option.

ONE word is allowed per charm. To add a symbol to each will cost additional. Add 1 unit of extra stamping fees per charm to your cart using this listing: https://www.etsy.com/listing/80281037

DURING CHECKOUT:
INDICATE if you want your words stamped straight across or curved on edge. If you don't state your preference Tipsy Whimsey will choose for you based on name length.
Disc 1.) color? stamping? font?
Disc 2.) color? stamping? font?
Disc 3.) color? stamping? font?
Pearl or Crystal? (Pearls will vary) (if Crystal, what color?)
Names Curved or Straight across?
Add a Tiny or Classic Heart in the center? (No Heart is the default option)

♥ To order your necklace as the "Earth, Wind, Fire & Water" set, select that during checkout.

Celebrate your love of the natural elements from our beautiful world!

Coppery Earth
Silvery Wind
Golden Fire
Crystal Blue Water

♥ If you want all silver chain and charms, for example, select "Silver" during checkout. Select "Mixed" if you want to choose your own flavors. Give me specific details during checkout notes.

♥ If you want all of your charms to have lowercase Typewriter font, select "1/16th L.C. Typewrite" during checkout. If you want it all mixed up, select "Mixed" and tell me what you want exactly during checkout notes.

♥ Character limits: Limit your words to what you see pictured. If you use 1/16th inch fonts, you can fit 5 across, or 6 curved along the bottom edges. If you use 1/8th inch font, you can fit 3 across or 4 along the bottom curve. XL 1/4th inch allows only 1 character per charm.

You can also have me stamp 1 symbol per charm, here is a guide showing all the symbols:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/166148205

♥ This necklace is designed with a lovely blue Swarovski crystal. You can pick your own birthstone color, or a freshwater pearl. Let me know during checkout what you want. The default will be the blue crystal with the Earth Wind Fire set, or a pearl for a Custom Name set. Pearl may vary from the photos.

Here is a guide to colors:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/114952122/add-crystals-or-add-freshwater-pearls-to

♥ You can pick your own chain length. up to 24" is included. Tell me during checkout or I will pick for you! (dainty 1.5mm ball chain has small tube closure)

This design comes with a silver bead-ball chain. You can also tell me you want Bright Silver, Antique Copper, Gold, Gunmetal or Black. Colors are limited. 

To upgrade to a cable chain, add this following listing to your cart, and pick your cable chain color during checkout:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/118384302/upgrade-to-an-18-inch-flat-oval-cable



If you want to add any other items to your necklace, or to your order, click on "keep shopping" during checkout and add any items you want. Include directions during checkout so I know what you'd like. 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

★★★INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO PAY FOR ADDITIONAL STAMPING FEES (stamping on the backside):
https://www.etsy.com/listing/80281037/

To get other ideas visit the charms section here at www.tipsywhimsey.etsy.com

More quantities can be custom ordered.

Always ask if you have an idea, and I can let you know how we can make it work :)


Add a gift box for $1.50 ~ locate the listing in my "charms" section.
http://www.etsy.com/listing/87485110/add-a-gift-box-to-your-existing-order

>>>>> See lots of other charm photos at:
http://www.facebook.com/#!/media/set/?set=a.433303059491.206896.60001389491&type=1

...............................................................................................................

Please visit my shop policies for more information.

PLEASE NOTE: Your jewelry will look its best and last longer if you do not wear it in the water.
...............................................................................................................

results.title: Grateful not Hateful, retro tee, vintage style shirt, love everyone, groovy tee, 70's style clothing, good vibes, hipster trendy
results.description:
Tina's Sweet Tee's Original Design!   Heat Transfer Vinyl Pressed design on Super Soft Cotton Poly Blend Unisex Tee 

TO ORDER: Please review all photos in listing.

                  1.)   Choose size.

                  2.)   Choose shirt color 

                  3.)   Tell us your print color choice in the Personalization Box - white or black 

                  4.)   Add to Cart

                  5.)  Add More Items if you Wish

                  6.)  Proceed to Check Out



SHIRT SIZING: Please see the Size Chart in listing photos, for shirt measurements. These shirts are Unisex and True to Size. If you prefer 'slim fit', size down one size. Shirts are shown with rolled sleeves, but are standard short sleeved tees. 


    All colors are are Airlumed and Ring Spun Cotton Poly Blend. Side seamed, Retail fit Unisex Sizing.
    We use Bella + Canvas, a customer favorite. If needed we will substitute a comparable brand (Tultex, Next Level or Anvil) and color if suppliers are out of the Bella + Canvas color chosen. 


COLOR OPTIONS: Please see Color Options in listing photos and chose color in drop down. 

     Note: Choose shirt and print color wisely. White shows best on middle to dark colored shirts and black shows best on middle to light colored shirts (black print will not show on a black shirt).

 
SHIRT PRODUCTION: We process our shirts using high quality heat transfer vinyl that we commercially press onto the shirts. The finished product is extremely durable and with proper care, with last a long time. 


CARE INSTRUCTIONS: Turn shirt inside out, and machine wash cold. Hang or lay flat to dry. Tumble on low heat to de-wrinkle if needed. Use mild detergent, no bleach, and no fabric softener. Do not iron directly on design. 


PROCESSING and SHIPPING: All Orders are Made to Order. Processing is 1-4 business days. Shipping is 2-5 days by USPS First Class with tracking provided. 

      If there is a delay in processing, we will contact you. We are not responsible for shipping delays within the USPS system. We suggest requesting email or text updates on all orders through the USPS website or app.

results.title: Laugh Stencil, Cursive Text, Reusable and Washable Stencil
results.description:
Ultra thin polyester film 0.005" thick for high quality reproduction
Reusable/Washable
Translucent color for accurate placement on workpiece
High quality plastic with similar properties to Mylar, but optimized for our laser cutting process.

Laugh Cursive Text

Sheet size is 5" x 8".  This is the size of the sheet.  Please see image on 1"x 1" grid for size of the cutout.

Image provided showing a 1"x 1" grid for easy size comparison of the cutout.

Laser cut for high reproduction of fine detail.

---Shipping---
Items are shipped by regular mail.  We ship orders 1-2 business days from receipt of order.

Typical shipping times are listed below.  Please note that there is no tracking for regular mail.  Delays can happen that may extend the delivery time.  Using regular mail allows us to keep the cost low for you!
Canada: 2-4 business days typically (please allow 6 business days before contacting me)
USA: 4-7 business days typically (please allow 9 business days before contacting me)
